description:
A smart choice for young Nordic skiers trying both skate and classic technique. The R/Combi Prolink Jr Boots have flex specifically tuned for smaller bodies and who are refining their classic technique. A supportive cuff provides power when it’s time to get in a bit of skating.

  • Velcro® strap and Quicklace system provide the fit and support needed for good skate technique
  • Lace cover has a diagonal zip to keep the snow out
  • Thinsulate® insulation for added warmth
  • Overlap construction shuts moisture out of the boot to increase your comfort
  • Prolink outsoles provide a low-profile boot-binding connection that is compatible with Salomon Prolink bindings and other bindings on the market using a 2 rail system
name: Salomon R/Combi Prolink Junior Boots - Children to Youths
